context: In the first study, the primary objective was to ascertain whether LC/MS and/or LC/MS/MS analysis could be used to measure LTB4 in EBC and to establish the best analytical conditions. Ion trap mass spectrometer was used for LTB4 analysis. This study will be called methodological study throughout the text. In the second study, a modified LC/MS/MS technique was applied to the measurement of LTB4 in EBC in atopic asthmatic children, atopic non-asthmatic children and healthy children. A triple quadrupole mass spectrometer was used for LC/MS/MS analysis of LTB4 in EBC. This study will be called observational study in children with asthma. Both studies were of cross-sectional design.
